front.title: IEEE Standard for Software Interface for Resource Management for a Broad-Based Environment for Test (ABBET)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The services needed to access and manage descriptive information about resources in an automatic test system (ATS) are covered. This information includes data about the automatic test equipment (ATE) instruments, switching, and the test subject adapter. This standard is a component of the ABBET set of standards.
